import React from 'react' import {Card,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useNavigate} from 'react-router' import '../style/cardStyle.css' const ProductCard = ({product}) => { let navigate = useNavigate() const navigateProduct=()=>{ navigate(`/updateProduct/${product._id}`) } return (
{product.name} Stock: {product.quantity} Price : {product.price} $
) } export default ProductCard
